StreamlabsToken.label: Streamlabs Socket Token
StreamlabsToken.tooltip: The Streamlabs Socket Token. This can be found on the website via the left-hand side menu -> API Settings -> API Tokens.

OpenSLAPISettingsLink.label: Get your Socket Token here
OpenSLAPISettingsLink.tooltip: Click here to go to the Streamlabs API settings page

EnableHostEvent.label: Enable Host Events
EnableHostEvent.tooltip: If checked, host events will trigger the message

HostMessageTemplate.value: Fellow $stream_team streamer @$display_name has $action the channel. Make sure you go give them a follow https://twitch.tv/$name
HostMessageTemplate.label: Host Message Template
HostMessageTemplate.tooltip:
$name = hosting channel name
$display_name = hosting user display name
$action = The event action: hosted or raided
$stream_team = Stream Team name

EnableShoutoutHook.label: Enable Shoutout Overlay Hook
